price: 42. Dan jika mereka (orang-orang musyrik) mendustakan engkau (Muhammad), begitu pulalah kaum-kaum yang sebelum mereka, kaum Nuh, `Ad, dan Samud (juga telah mendustakan rasul-rasul-Nya),
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wathamūdu
